评论详情: These shirts are reasonably priced and great fitting.  I'm not a golfer but I bought this for horseback riding because of the sun protection factor built into the fabric. The fabric is substantial but with great breathability. I'm not a golfer but use them for horseback riding.  They're super comfortable and have a very flattering fit. I come home smelling like a horse stable and toss it in the washer, and air dry on a hangar, and it comes out wrinkle free, smelling great and looking brand new wash after wash. Very very happy with this purchase.  In fact, I ended up buying ten of these shirts because they come in such great patterns and colors. I get compliments almost every time I wear them.

Love this top for playing golf.  Very comfortable, made well, lots of prints and colors to choose from.  I don't love the stand up collar.  It is a bit too high, but not irritating.  I'm keeping it and will enjoy wearing it.
I like the print and material is soft

评论概述: Very nice shirt, love the sleeve length
评论详情: This top ran a bit small so size up but other than that it’s great. Very nice fabric and stitching. I love the elbow sleeve length. Very good quality. Great top for golfing.

I loved the 3/4 sleeves of this top.  I am getting older and want my upper arms covered.  It is very comfortable.  I am 5'6", 155 lbs.  Bought a large and it fits perfectly.  I like things a little loose.  Love the top!!

These shirts are okay for the price.  Bought an XL for golf.  Really like the style with the raglan sleeve. It's a true fit but a little off.  There is pucker at the bottom of the zipper and the fabric pulls just enough for the zipper to not hang straight.  Also on one side where the collar is sewn on the shirt.  The fabric is nice and washed once in cold water on delicate and air dried.  No change.  It will be OK to wear around the house.Also bought one in a different color and had to return it because the zipper pull was broken off in the package.
Love the shirt.... but it runs very slim.  I wear a medium or large.... definitely a large in this item

评论概述: Love this shirt, but it pils bad.
评论详情: 5’2” 150lb size L fit great.  True to size. The only negative otherwise it’d be a 5 star, is the pilling. I have hand washed it and it even did it. So I put it on delicate in washer and no difference. So I just wash on delicate now saving me handwashing, pilled and all, I still wear it.

I love the pattern & the elbow sleeves are a big plus now that I older ( older, not old). I normally wear petites as I’m only 5’2” so it’s alittle long, but not a deal breaker. The zip up collar is a tad high. All & all it’s a great, fun, lightweight, feel good top for summer.

评论概述: Cute but not a good fit
评论详情: I liked the silky fabric and the geometric design, but the fit was off.  It was boxy through the torso so that it looked sloppy.
Like the half sleeve which gives a little more coverage than short sleeve shirts.  Washes & dries well.  Comfortable stretch material. This senior lady will be wearing it for a dance class.

The shirt in itself was very nice and Design was nice.  Since most golf shirts run a little small I Purchased a large. It was just two boxy, and the sleeves went all the way to my elbows. May try a medium in the future, but return this one.

Bought a size up because I don't like clingy shirts when golfing. Length is long enough for good coverage. The sleeves are perfect, about elbow length, and not too tight. It hangs nicely. Collar and zip are better than buttons.

评论概述: These are super, will order again.
评论详情: Just a little small ( L ) in the shoulder for me as a golf player. I will order again XL & different color. The large I will ware, not for golf.

评论概述: Just right sleeves but not for humid weather
评论详情: I don't golf. I am short, with short arms, so your fit would likely differ than mine, but for me the fit of this half sleeve shirt is nearly perfect, and I bought this specifically for the sleeve length. These completely cover my elbow but are still shorter than 3/4 length. I also like the raglan sleeve and the curved hem. I prefer a johnny collar over the zip, and this particular collar prefers to stand; the top of the unzipped zipper rubbed my neck uncomfortably. The pretty fabric feels thick and plastic; it did not prove comfortable on a warm humid day. There are no written care instructions on the tag, but the symbols indicate not to tumble dry.  I don't understand why I can't find this sleeve length anywhere else; with an aging population it should be very popular. If it were comfortable on a humid summer day I would have bought more, but it's not, so I won't.

Happy to find elbow sleeve length golf shirts, it keeps me cool and fits well tho it could be just a bit longer for me (I’m tall). I wish there were shirts with a more subtle print and some solid colored shirts as well
Nice fabric, true to size and sleeve length to elbow is a plus when being treated for skin cancer.

I got this to use as a scrub shirt. I'm normally size small but got the medium for a loser fit and to fit a long sleeve shirt underneath in cooler weather. The only thing I don't like about it is that if it's unzipped a little too far it shows a plain white color underneath.

I bought this shirt along with another one in a different pattern. Same size, but this one was about 2 inches shorter in the back than the swirl print one. Tag was super scratchy on the side as well, and placed for maximum irritation.
Nice fabric, good fit and true to size. I like the sleeve length and the zip neckline. Very comfortable for golf! I’ll be ordering more of these tops.

评论概述: A little snug through the hips
评论详情: {size Small) Shirt fabric is very smooth but the fit seemed a little snug in the hip area for my taste. The black and white print is extremely bright and bold. I decided to return the shirt because I knew that I wouldn't feel comfortable wearing it.

I would give these shirts five stars in a heartbeat because of the fit and comfort, but some of the colors were such a disappointment.  What appeared to be bright pink & black Argyle is actually dull pink & brown. Ugh. *Frowning*  The Hawaiian-style pattern also has WAY more orange to it, even though the photo makes it look predominantly bright pink. That was another disappointing pattern. Most complexions don’t look all that great in orange.  I would give much higher marks to the zebra pattern and the greenish ocean-type pattern if I were reviewing those alone. Those were a lot more flattering and truer to the pictures.  I’ll keep all these shirts because I do like the fit and style, but they will not become my overall favorites as I had hoped.

I bought this top to wear golfing.  It is very comfortable and attractive.  I am happy with this purchase.  The fact that it has elbow length sleeves, which are hard to find in regular golf shirts, is a plus.

I washed the shirt (actually 3 shirts in different patterns) and it/they came out great.  The problem with the one I wore today is that there is absolutely no breathability in the fabric.  I walked on a 75 degree day and ended up sweating like it was the middle of summer.  I felt like I had a plastic bag on instead of a shirt.  I will keep them because they are so inexpensive but I won’t wear them if exercise is involved.

评论概述: The Perfect Golf Shirt for the Stylish Lady Golfer
评论详情: Are you passionate about golf and also fashion? Do you find it hard to strike a balance between what you wear on the course and what you wear to work, or just around town? Look no further than the Pink and Plaid Women’s Golf Shirt.  Firstly, this shirt fits as expected, meaning that you can order your usual size without worrying about any surprises. The quality stitching ensures that it will last through countless games and washes, without any loose threads or unraveling.  But what sets this shirt apart is its versatile nature. Not only is it perfect for playing golf, but it can also be worn for everyday activities. The comfort that it provides will make you forget that you are even wearing a golf shirt. The lightness of the fabric is ideal for hot days on the course, and the stylish pink and plaid design will make you stand out in the best way possible.  In summary, if you are looking for a golf shirt that ticks all the boxes, look no further than the Pink and Plaid Women’s Golf Shirt. Its quality stitching, expected fit, and versatile nature make it the perfect addition to any golfer's wardrobe.

I ordered this shirt for myself and ordered it to size.  I should have ordered a size large.  I don't like when shirts are too clingy especially if I am playing golf which is why I ordered the shirt.  Is the size going to stop me from wearing it?  No, but I would definitely order a size larger.  The design is very pretty and the shirt itself is light which will help keep me cool in the warmer months.

评论概述: do you like compliments? You will get them wearing this shirt
评论详情: I walked onto the golf course on Sunday and in a matter of 10 minutes 4 people complimented me on this shirt. The pink plaid on white with the fine white brown stripes looks classy, modern and fashionable. And this shirt does not only look good, it feels great on your skin too. The zipper and the collar give it a sportyflair, but you can wear this shirt to work or shopping or dining and not just for golf or tennis. The sleeves are cut a tad longer which helps to hide what the sun does not need to burn. This is definitely a better quality shirt and comparable to some of the big brand names in the golf store that cost between $80 and $120. At $31 minus a current 8% coupon this shirt is a good buy!
Beautiful , bought more

I got this shirt to wear for golf.  I like the idea of a shirt a little different from the normal polo shirt - this design is very cute!  I like the zip closure, I like the collar which is can be worn up to protect your neck or down like a normal collar.  I also like the sleeves - they are a little bit longer than a normal polo.  They come down to my elbows so they will protect me a little more from sun and bugs.  I like the raglan sleeves rather than the set-in sleeves because when I buy a larger size, I don't have to worry about the shoulder seam hitting me in the wrong place.As sizing goes, this would go a little bit on the smaller side.  I always get XLs and this XL is just a little bit smaller than normal XLs.

The fit is flattering, the material is soft and silky, and the colors just scream summer. What's not to love?!  I love how this shirt fits and feels. The scoop sides are very flattering for all body types as is the zip front opening.  This shirt is perfect for sports, running errands, or just casual wear. The quality is good and the price is right so you may want to pick up a couple.

Not only is this top flattering with the elbow length sleeves & mock neck but it is also functional with the zipper & lightweight breathable material to keep cool on hot days. Excellent quality. Would recommend!

This top was of great quality.  It is very soft, and the sleeves come just above the elbow, which I really like, not too short to be uncomfortable.  I love the vibrant color and pattern.  I ordered a large, which is the size I usually wear, because I like things a little loose, but the size was just a little bigger than I expected.  I would probably order a size smaller if you don't like it too baggy.

Probably my favorite black/white top on my wife!  Highlights her Florida tan and silver hair.  Fits her like a dream.  Guys, pay attention here *** Buy this right NOW for your wife for Mother's Day! *** You will collect a whole year's worth of kudos!  The zipper in front allows her to regulate heat AND change the appearance of the collar.  Wicking material takes most of the moisture away.  Can't go wrong with this shirt - on the court or out being "courted!"
Nice material which makes the fit good. Love the bright colors. Washed up great.

This top is great! The quality of the fabric is excellent, it is soft, lightweight, and breathable. I ordered up a size from my typical size, and would not recommend doing so. Stick with your typical size - it was very large on me everywhere! Love the pattern, super fun and such great quality
Like that this shirt has longer sleeves than a normal golf shirt.  I ordered an XL and it fit perfectly.  I'm 5'9, 200 lbs, and typically wear a size 12-14.
The sleeves are longer and look very attractive. The fabric is soft and comfortable and appears that it will hold up to repeated washings.  Very sturdy zipper adds a classy look to this shirt.
